DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop test usability computerize symptom assessment management intervention system laboratory setting ( phase I ) feasibility clinical set group randomize trial ( phase II ) .
DOC.brief_title: Lung Cancer Symptom Assessment Management Intervention
DOC.criteria: HCPs : attending physician , thoracic medical oncologist , expect work set least 2 year . Patients : 21 year age old ; diagnosis Stage IIIA , IIIB , IV nonsmall cell lung cancer OR limit extensive stage small cell lung cancer ; receive care outpatient setting ; receive treatment chemotherapy +/ additional therapy ; English speaking . Patients : Any patient need emergent care , routine visit schedule less month
